name: Patin Grappin
description:
This game has been created as an end of year project for the Cnam-Enjmin school in Angoulême. It requires an eye tracking device (tobii 4C) in order to play.

Patin grappin is an arcade game played with the eyes and head. You can choose where to grapple with your gaze and move around by rotating your head. The grapple makes you go faster and can get you in high spaces. 

(It's basically a "wintersport spiderman played with the eyes".)

Team:
Raoul Desmarest (Graphic Designer)
Robin Cugniet (Sound designer)
François Candela (Programmer)
Malo Dalmier (Game designer)
Antoine Danielou (UX designer)
Valérie Galchynska (2D artist) 

Extra stats:

Enjoy the game.
Ça patine, ça grappine !
